name: Foosocial
author: WP Maniax

sections.description:
Add sticky social share bar to your web footer.

Foosocial is super easy to install and configure.

It supports most popular social networks and is fully responsive.

Take a look at the Video Preview

Main Features:

  • easy to install and configure
  • most popular social networks supported (Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, LinkedIn, Reddit, Tumblr, StumbleUpon )
  • fully responsive
  • slide-in animation support
  • show Foosocial after user scroll down the page
  • configure where to show (posts, pages, home, archives)
  • nice and elegant design

Feedback

http://www.wpmaniax.com/foosocial/
sections.installation:
1. Upload foosocial folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings / Foosocial to configure the plugin
